name: prmetrics
description: Augments pull request titles to let reviewers quickly determine PR size and test coverage.

scripts.build:initialization:debug: npm ci && mkdirp debug && ncp src debug
scripts.build:initialization:release: npm ci && mkdirp release && ncp src release
scripts.build:debug: npm run build:initialization:debug && cd debug/task && tsc --sourceMap
scripts.build:release: npm run build:initialization:release && cd release/task && tsc && ncc build index.js --out . --minify && ncp index.js index.mjs && rimraf src tests typedocs index.js index.ts package.json tsconfig.json typedoc.json && cd .. && mkdirp extension && ncp ../package.json extension/package.json
scripts.build:package: npm ci && ncc build src/task/index.ts --out dist --minify && ncp dist/index.js dist/index.mjs && rimraf dist/index.js dist/package.json && ncp src/task/Strings/resources.resjson/en-US/resources.resjson dist/resources.resjson
scripts.build: npm run build:release && npm run build:package && npm run build:docs
scripts.deploy: npm run build:release && exitzero tfx build tasks delete --task-id 907d3b28-6b37-4ac7-ac75-9631ee53e512 --no-prompt && tfx build tasks upload --task-path release/task --no-prompt
scripts.test: npm run build:debug && cd debug/task && c8 --reporter=text --reporter=text-summary mocha tests/**/*.spec.js
scripts.test:fast: mkdirp debug && ncp src debug && cd debug/task && tsc --sourceMap && c8 --reporter=text --reporter=text-summary mocha tests/**/*.spec.js
